document.masterDocTitle: A new species of the genus Neolycaena de Nicéville, 1890 from Kyrgyzstan (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of the genus Neolycaena de Nicéville, 1890 from Kyrgyzstan (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lycaena Tengstroemi Erschoff, 1874
, Izvestiya Imperatorskogo Obstshestva Lyubiteley Estestvoznaniya, Antropologii i Etnografii [ Известия Императорского Общества любителей естествознания, антропологии и этнографии ] 11 (2): 11; pl. 1, fig. 8 (Type locality: “Turkestan, Kysyl-Kum sands”, after lectotype designation ( Zhdanko, 1998b: 648; lectotype in ZMMU ).

Material examined.
2 males , Beginning of May , Turkestan , Kyzyl-Kum , leg. Fedtchenko ( lectotype and paralectotype of
tengstroemi
) ( ZMMU )
;
5 males ,
30.v.1985
, Kazakhstan ,
85 km N of Sergeevka
, Lepsy river , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( holotype and paratypes of balchaschensis )
;
6 males , 1 female ,
28.v.1985
, Kazakhstan ,
40 km N of Ushtobe
, Karatal river , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( paratypes of balchaschensis )
;
23.v.1975
, Kazakhstan , Bakanas , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( paratypes of balchaschensis )
;
1 male , 1 female ,
11.vi. 1991
, 20 km NW Nurly , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( paratypes of balchaschensis )
;
2 males ,
2.vi.1978
, Kazakhstan , 20 km NW of Syaka , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( paratypes of balchaschensis )
;
1 male ,
25.vi.1980
, Zaisan lake ,
10 km W of Krupskoy
settlement, leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( paratype of balchaschensis )
;
3 males ,
27.v.1910
, Russian Empire , Zaisansky Uezd , Karabulak , leg. Jacobson ( ZISP ) ( paratypes of balchaschensis )
;
4 males , 3 females ,
5.vi.1990
, Kazakhstan , Transilian Alatau Mts. , 33 km W of Almaty , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( holotype and paratypes of submontana )

, Kirghizia , 5 km SW of Naryn , leg. Sinev ( ZISP )
;

, Kazakhstan , Tarbagatai , Saur foothills, Kishkenetau , leg. Sushkin ( ZISP ) ( holotype and paratypes of saurica )
;

25.v.2013
, Kazakhstan , 6 km N of Makanchi , leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( holotype and paratype of gogulini )
;
1 male , 1 female ,
11.v.2013
, Kazakhstan , Chu-Ili mountains ,
30 km NW of Karabastau
, leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( holotype and paratype of chuilensis )
;

, Kazakhstan , Alakol lake , Barmakkum sands,

, leg. Zhdanko ( ZISP ) ( holotype of emel )

, leg. Korb ( SKK ).
Distribution. Widely distributed in the deserts, semi-deserts and steppes of Middle Asia and Kazakhstan .
Habitats. Deserts, semideserts, dry steppes in lowlands and middle-mountains (under 1800 m ) (plate 3: figs. 4, 7, 8).
